description: Vrumugun is the name given to a group of Copy Men created by Eris Vrumugun. All of the Vrumugun copies are identical in power and appearance, each with the power of a third rate sorcerer. Their only distinguishing feature is a ruby embedded in their foreheads, used by Eris to control them. Also, in the anime only, it was revealed that one of the Vrumuguns had a bald spot under his hood.
name: Vrumugun
